pr_title: Allow for specifying amount to increase itemstack in /more

timeline.message: Allow specifying amount to increase the itemstack in /more
Include max stack size in message
Fix issue with incrementing to max stack size
Default to proper stack size when invalid number provided

timeline.bodyText: Not really a big fan of this kind of try/throw/catch, looks very messy. Maybe use NumberUtil::isInt(String) here instead, and additionally check that the parsed number is greater than zero. If either fails, throw the exception for nonZeroPosNumber.
timeline.author: pop4959

timeline.bodyText: I feel like this is a bit technical for most users -- keep in mind that /more could be used by players, not just developers / server admins. They could probably be condensed to something like "Your stack has been set to its maximum size.", or maybe even absolutely nothing at all (because without arguments this is the normal operation of the command).
